alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 14 at 9:01PM MDT until April 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Montana... Lodge Creek near International Border affecting Northern Blaine County and Hill County zones. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Lodge Creek near International Border. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:25 PM MDT Friday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1015 AM MDT.
